name: Summon Night 2
overview: Summon Night 2 is a tactical strategy game with RPG elements where players take control of a male of female hero and venture into grid-based battlefields. The Summon Night games are story intensive with well developed characters who interact with other well developed characters. The protagonist is a summoner who may call upon creatures from the four worlds to aid and abet during battlefield dramatics. Building on the popularity of the original Summon Night, the sequel continues the ability of summoning animal familiars to help in battles as well as magical attacks to scorch foes. Beasts may also evolve as they gain more experience and take on new forms. Players may also engage in mini-games to gain experience and items. 2nd fantasy simulation RPG that takes place a different world "Ryinbaumu".
